revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Crown Shrine |image = [[File:Crown Shrine.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Crown Shrine. |tokens = 2,200,000 |location = North of Path to the Peak }} '''Crown Shrine''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 33,915,762 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===

===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | {{Pokemon|Galarian Rapidash}}|| rowspan=4|<center>161,099,869 || rowspan=5 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | {{Pokemon|Abomasnow}} |- | {{Pokemon|Trevenant}} |- | {{Pokemon|Weavile}} |- | '''{{Pokemon|Calyrex}}'''* || <center>169,578,810 |}
'''*Note:''' Must have made progress in [[Questlines#The_Crown_of_Galar|The Crown of Galar]] Questline to unlock.
